channel.title: Script on Daozhang
channel.description: Recent content in Script on Daozhang

item.title: Vasp_scripts
item.description: 一些小脚本 1. OSZICAR最后一行信息 $i $ionstep $F $E $mag(如果有) 1 2 3 4 5 6 for i in {1..80} do E=`tail -1 OSZICAR-$i` inf=`echo $E|cut -d " " -f 1,3,5,10` echo $i $inf >>energy done $AveP = \sum$ 2.截断能测试 1 2
